content: *k2tog repeat from * to the end of the round 9 10 sts decrease 9 10 sts rem cut the yarn leaving an 8 /20 cm tail thread the tail onto a tapestry needle and pull the yarn through the remaining 9 10 sts to secure them 4 | marshmallow earflap hat ©2025 shaina bilow designs no unauthorized duplication or distribution of this pattern www shainabilow com @shaina bilow shaina bilow designs
